attributes.action: Reduce the Working week to 4 days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To reduce the 5 day working week to 4 in order to increase the quality of life. All permanent staffs shall maintain their salaries and all contractual should have half days pay. Wednesday should be declared as a bona fide holiday much like a Sunday, where shops are obliged to close early.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
